languages.text: {n}Кассия беспокойно оглядывается по сторонам.{/n} "Они чуят запах мыслей, видят их цвет... как и я! Нам не скрыться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия беспокойно оглядывается по сторонам.{/n} "Они чуят запах мыслей, видят их цвет... как и я! Нам не скрыться".

languages.text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия беспокойно оглядывается по сторонам.{/n} "Они чуят запах мыслей, видят их цвет... как и я! Нам не скрыться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."
{n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."
{n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."
{n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."
{n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

languages.text: {n}Cassia mira a su alrededor, presa de la ansiedad.{/n} «Pueden oler nuestros pensamientos y ver sus colores... ¡como yo! No podremos escondernos de ellos».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia mira a su alrededor, presa de la ansiedad.{/n} «Pueden oler nuestros pensamientos y ver sus colores... ¡como yo! No podremos escondernos de ellos».

languages.text: {n}卡西娅焦急地看着周围。{/n}“它们能嗅到我们的思想，能看到它们的颜色……就像我一样！我们没办法避开它们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅焦急地看着周围。{/n}“它们能嗅到我们的思想，能看到它们的颜色……就像我一样！我们没办法避开它们。”

languages.text: {n}カシアは不安そうに辺りを見回す。{/n}「相手はこちらの思考を嗅ぎつけ、自分の色を視覚できます…あたくしと同じように！隠れる場所などありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは不安そうに辺りを見回す。{/n}「相手はこちらの思考を嗅ぎつけ、自分の色を視覚できます…あたくしと同じように！隠れる場所などありません」

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt sich nervös um.{/n} "Sie riechen unsere Gedanken, können deren Farbe sehen ... genau wie ich! Wir können uns vor ihnen nicht verstecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt sich nervös um.{/n} "Sie riechen unsere Gedanken, können deren Farbe sehen ... genau wie ich! Wir können uns vor ihnen nicht verstecken."

languages.text: {n}Cassia jette des regards nerveux à la ronde.{/n} « Ils sentent nos pensées, ils voient leur couleur... tout comme moi ! Il est impossible de leur échapper. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia jette des regards nerveux à la ronde.{/n} « Ils sentent nos pensées, ils voient leur couleur... tout comme moi ! Il est impossible de leur échapper. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia gergince etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Düşüncelerimizin kokusunu alıyorlar, renklerini görüyorlar... Tıpkı benim gibi! Saklanacak yerimiz yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks around anxiously.{/n} "They can smell our thoughts, they can see their colour... just like I can! There's no hiding from them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia gergince etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Düşüncelerimizin kokusunu alıyorlar, renklerini görüyorlar… Tıpkı benim gibi! Saklanacak yerimiz yok."
